They have <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> <st data-num="01116" class="">places</st> here<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01116" class="">for worship</st> of the god <st data-num="01168" class="">Baal</st> so that they could <st data-num="08313" class="">sacrifice</st> their <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st> as <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offerings</st> to <st data-num="01168" class="">him</st> in the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. Such sacrifices<n id="2" /> are <st data-num="0834" class="">something</st> I <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> them to make. They are something I <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">told</st> them to do! Indeed, such a thing <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> even <st data-num="05927 05921">entered</st> my <st data-num="03820" class="">mind</st>.
So I, the Lord, say: ‘The time will soon come that people will no longer call this place Topheth or the Hinnom Valley. But they will call this valley the Valley of Slaughter!

In <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> I will <st data-num="01238" class="">thwart</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06098" class="">plans</st> of the people of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>. I will deliver them over <st data-num="06440" class="">to the power</st> of their <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> who are <st data-num="01245" class="">seeking</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">to kill</st> them. They will <st data-num="05307" class="">die</st> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03027" class="">at the hands of</st> their enemies.<n id="3" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> their <st data-num="05038" class="">dead bodies</st> <st data-num="03978" class="">food</st> for the <st data-num="05775 08064">birds</st> and <st data-num="0776" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">beasts</st> to eat.

I will <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> an <st data-num="08047" class="">object of horror</st>, a <st data-num="08322" class="">thing to be hissed at</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> who <st data-num="05674" class="">pass</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> it will <st data-num="08074" class="">be filled with horror</st> and will <st data-num="08319" class="">hiss out</st> their <st data-num="08319" class="">scorn</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921">because of</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04347" class="">disasters</st> that have happened to it.<n id="2" />

I will reduce the people of this city to desperate straits during the siege imposed on it by their enemies who are seeking to kill them. I will make them so desperate that they will eat the flesh of their own sons and daughters and the flesh of one another.”’”’
The Lord continued, “Now break the jar in front of those who have come here with you.

Tell them the Lord of Heaven’s Armies says, ‘I will do just as Jeremiah has done. I will smash this nation and this city as though it were a potter’s vessel that is broken beyond repair. The dead will be buried here in Topheth until there is no more room to bury them.’
I, the Lord, say: ‘That is how I will deal with this city and its citizens. I will make it like Topheth.

The houses in Jerusalem and the houses of the kings of Judah will be defiled by dead bodies just like this place, Topheth. For they offered sacrifice to the stars and poured out drink offerings to other gods on the roofs of those houses.’”
Then Jeremiah left Topheth where the Lord had sent him to give that prophecy. He went to the Lord’s temple and stood in its courtyard and called out to all the people.

“The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘I will soon bring on this city and all the towns surrounding it all the disaster I threatened to do to it. I will do so because they have stubbornly refused to pay any attention to what I have said!’”
